checkDoesNotApplyStatusCode.description: Debug information to show if the status code is not 200
checkDoesNotApplyStatusCode.message: Check does not apply to status code !== 200

checkDoesNotApplyUri.description: Debug information to show if the resource is a DataURI
checkDoesNotApplyUri.message: Check does not apply for data URIs

contentTypeValueInvalid.description: Report message when content type value fails to parse

contentTypeValueShouldBe.description: Report message when content type value is not valid

contentTypeValueShoudBeNot.description: Report message when a content type is not the right one
contentTypeValueShoudBeNot.message: 'content-type' header media type value should be '$1', not '$2'.

responseShouldIncludeContentType.description: Report message when response doesn't include the content type header

invalidMediaType.description: Error message for invalid media type

contentTypeValueShouldNotContaint.description: Report message when the content type shouldn't contain a charset
